snippet: Two days after his inauguration, Mayor Ed Murray announced a plan that includes a new interim police chief, a nationwide search for a permanent chief and community outreach to parts of the city where trust has eroded.
abstract: Seattle Mayor Ed Murray, just two days after his inauguration, says he is leaping into an ambitious and perhaps politically risky effort to overhaul the Seattle Police Department.
lead_paragraph: Two days after his inauguration, Mayor Ed Murray announced a plan that includes a new interim police chief, a nationwide search for a permanent chief and community outreach to parts of the city where trust has eroded.

headline.main: New Mayor in Seattle to Overhaul Police Dept.
headline.print_headline: New Mayor in Seattle to Overhaul Police Dept.
